comment: Smart Data Models - WindContQIEC adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/WindContQIEC/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Q control model.  Reference: IEC Standard 61400-27-1 Section 6.6.5.6.

contents.name: WindTurbineType3or4IEC
contents.comment: Wind turbine type 3 or 4 model with which this reactive control mode is associated. Default: None

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: iqh1
contents.comment: Maximum reactive current injection during dip (i). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: iqmax
contents.comment: Maximum reactive current injection (i). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: iqmin
contents.comment: Minimum reactive current injection (i). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: iqpost
contents.comment: Post fault reactive current injection (). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kiq
contents.comment: Reactive power PI controller integration gain (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kiu
contents.comment: Voltage PI controller integration gain (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpq
contents.comment: Reactive power PI controller proportional gain (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpu
contents.comment: Voltage PI controller proportional gain (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kqv
contents.comment: Voltage scaling factor for LVRT current (). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: qmax
contents.comment: Maximum reactive power (q). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: qmin
contents.comment: Minimum reactive power (q). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rdroop
contents.comment: Resistive component of voltage drop impedance (). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tiq
contents.comment: Time constant in reactive current lag (T). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

contents.name: tpfilt
contents.comment: Power measurement filter time constant (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

contents.name: tpost
contents.comment: Length of time period where post fault reactive power is injected (). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0

contents.name: tqord
contents.comment: Time constant in reactive power order lag (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

contents.name: tufilt
contents.comment: Voltage measurement filter time constant (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

contents.name: udb1
contents.comment: Voltage dead band lower limit (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: udb2
contents.comment: Voltage dead band upper limit (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: umax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage in voltage PI controller integral term (u). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: umin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage in voltage PI controller integral term (u). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: uqdip
contents.comment: Voltage threshold for LVRT detection in q control (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: uref0
contents.comment: User defined bias in voltage reference (), used when  =. It is case dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: windLVRTQcontrolModesType
contents.comment: Types of LVRT Q control modes (). It is project dependent parameter. Default: None

contents.name: windQcontrolModesType
contents.comment: Types of general wind turbine Q control modes ().  It is project dependent parameter. Default: None

contents.name: xdroop
contents.comment: Inductive component of voltage drop impedance (). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
